org.jlab.cnuphys.histogram

Class DataPoints

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.cnuphys.histogram.DataPoints

  • public class DataPoints
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies the characteristics to create DataPoints object
    Version:
    061714
    Author:
    Erin Kirby

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataPoints()
      Constructor that initializes an array to story 1 x and 1 y point as well as their x and y errors.

            double x,
            double y)
        Sets the specified x and y point at the specified index
        Parameters:
        index - what index to set the point to, in array indexing format (0 <= index < array size)
        x - the point's x coordinate
        y - the point's y coordinate

        ye - the y coordinate of the error
